articles.content: The Hogwarts Legacy gameplay showcase gave us a much more detailed look at how we'll create our character, plus a look inside the castle and an introduction to combat. Hogwarts Legacy gameplay showca… [+2332 chars]

articles.author: Imogen Donovan
articles.title: Dr Disrespect says Warzone 2.0's new mode has 'no chance' - GAMINGbible
articles.description: "Nobody wants to play that 6th grade design."
articles.content: YouTuber and streamer Herschel "Dr Disrespect" Beahm IV gaveCall of Duty: Warzone 2.0 a verbal clobbering over the weekend, comparing the new DMZ mode to the work of a sixth-grader. That's the age of… [+1897 chars]

articles.author: Heidi Nicholas
articles.title: Disney Dreamlight Valley devs "couldn't be happier" with Game Pass - TrueAchievements
articles.description: Disney Dreamlight Valley's lead producer Manea Castet spoke to us about the Game Pass experience, the design process for achievements, and how the game's Toy Story content update will be "considerably bigger" than Scar's update.
